name: Bestial Tendencies (Kinetic Visual Novel)
description:
This is the story of a human experiment....Takeo ; experiment number 1 seeks to stop the ones who made him how he is.....How is he? Imagine the entire animal kingdom coursing through your veins. And why must he stop the ones who made him how he is? They want to commit genocide to every other race except theirs.....This is Takeo's story.

Download is below

also just a quick side note , during the fight animations do not click they dont go faster clicking will result in you having to rewatch the animation from the start
